text: David Zakharyevich Sarajishvili (; (born October 28, 1848, Tiflis, Russian Empire — June 20, 1911, Tiflis, Russian Empire) — Russian scientist of Georgian origin, entrepreneur and philanthropist. He founded several cognac plants in the Russian Empire, including the Tbilisi and Kizlyar Brandy Factory. == Other websites == * Homepage der Firma Sarajishvili mit Angaben zur Biografie Saradschischwilis * Biografie Saradschischwilis Category:1848 births Category:1911 deaths
title: David Sarajishvili
